column3: Dear John, I'm not sure what to make of this but you're a fucking mess.
column9: Dear John, I'm not sure what to make of this but you're a fucking mess.

column3: Dear John, I'm going to miss you so much. But I don't want to do it.
column9: Dear John, I'm going to miss you so much. But I don't want to do it.

column3: Dear John, I'm going to be in a video about my new book tomorrow (March 13) and I want to tell you that it's not a book. It's a story about how my wife, a nurse, and a firefighter became the first couple in their family ever to die and it was a wonderful story.
column9: Dear John, I'm going to be in a video about my new book tomorrow (March 13) and I want to tell you that it's not a book. It's a story about how my wife, a nurse, and a firefighter became the first couple in their family ever to die and it was a wonderful story.

column3: Dear John, I'm a huge fan of @johngreen. I am deeply saddened by your decision. It was a deeply disappointing decision and I wish him luck in the future endeavors of his business.
column9: Dear John, I'm a huge fan of @johngreen. I am deeply saddened by your decision. It was a deeply disappointing decision and I wish him luck in the future endeavors of his business.

column3: Dear John, I have a friend who is a professional writer who has written for a bunch of different places. He's been working on this for years. And I know it's not easy for him to do it all at once.

column6: Dear John, I know how to do that, but I'm not a good fit in the video.
Dear John, I want to make a video about you.
Dear John, this is a thing! I just read a tweet from @jennifermc IRL and it's so sad!
Dear John, I love that you got to meet him so much.
Dear John, I would like to make you available for a chat.
